ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 185
ygData.msgSnippet: I have known something was not right and I just figured it out why it was bothering me. Our Level 1 DD spell (and every DoT spell) is an
ygData.messageBody:
<another rant>
I have known something was not right and I just figured it out why it was
bothering me. Our Level 1 DD spell (and every DoT spell) is an Alteration
spell. Every DD spell afer 1st level except the AE DD spell at 39th level is
Evocation. Why the change? By this I mean why did it go from an Alteration
spell at 1st to an Evocation spell up until level 39 where it becomes an
Alteration spell, and then back to an Evocation spell?



Well the reason that the level 1 spell is Alt is that it is not a DD spell
it is the first of the Dot spells. Try it on yourself it does the first
damage then about 20 more after that. The first Evoc spell / DD spell is
at level 8.



Also, why do we skip an upgrade to the 12th level DoT at 20th level? This is
the only level that this happens.


This is not the only level that this happens when you hit 29 get use to
your DOT since it the last one you get till you hit 49.



Kryten Emohawk

49 Enchanter E'CI
